home.title: AgentifUI
home.subtitle: Explore the infinite possibilities of AI and create intelligent new experiences

feature1.title: Large Model Integration
feature1.description: Support for multiple model providers including OpenAI, Anthropic, Dify, etc., meeting different enterprise needs

feature2.title: RAG Knowledge Enhancement
feature2.description: Integrate Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) technology to enable private knowledge bases and context awareness

feature3.title: Enterprise Deployment
feature3.description: Support for private deployment, ensuring data security, providing stable and reliable services based on Dify backend

about.title: About AgentifUI
about.subtitle: Connecting AI with enterprises, creating new experiences with large language models

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: AgentifUI is committed to leveraging the power of large language models to provide innovative application solutions for enterprises. We integrate capabilities from multiple model providers and provide stable, reliable services based on Dify backend, helping organizations fully utilize the value of AI technology.

innovation.title: Technical Innovation
innovation.description: Continuously integrate cutting-edge large model technologies to provide leading AI solutions for enterprises

security.title: Data Security
security.description: Support private deployment and strict data protection measures to ensure the security and privacy of enterprise data

flexibility.title: Flexible Customization
flexibility.description: Provide highly customizable solutions to meet specific needs of different industries and scenarios

knowledge.title: Knowledge Enhancement
knowledge.description: Integrate private knowledge bases through RAG technology to enhance model's contextual awareness capabilities

copyright.suffix: . Explore the future of large model applications.
